definition: A derogatory term typically used to refer to a bodily fluid that is excreted by humans, primarily males, as a waste product of the urinary system. It is commonly employed in informal contexts to express anger, frustration, or contempt towards someone or something.

examples.english: The toilet is full of piss.

examples.german: Er hat mir ins Gesicht gepisst.
Sie hat sich vor Lachen fast in die Pisse gemacht.
